build.buildCommand: npm install && npx prisma generate && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back 20260102120000_add_store_location_and_special_code 2>/dev/null || true; (npx prisma migrate deploy || (echo 'Migration failed, syncing schema...' && npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss)); npm run start:prod
